pr_title: Fix condition in ILM step that cannot be met

timeline.message:
Fix ILM step statement that can never be met

ReplaceDataStreamBackingIndexStep#performAction seems to perform an equality
check on an original Index and the write indexes names, but because this
compares an Index instance to a String, the condition can never be met.
I added a test that triggers this code path but am not sure if this scenario can
really happen in practice or if the test is too constructed. Happy to change,
just wanted to raise this since I happend to run across the warning in the code.
